title: Art School Anarchy - Banco {Chesh}
content:
HI!   
do you know this font. i used it some years ago   
and but i dont know its name :-(   
   
 [http://www.artschoolanarchy.de/pic/font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121029160221/http:/www.artschoolanarchy.de/pic/font.jpg)   
   
Thanks! Volker
author: anonymous

comments.content: Ahh, Banco will always be "Thrasher" Magazine to me.. :sigh:
For me, it will always be the worst play I ever saw at the theater company I used to work for, with a design thrust upon me by the then-wife of the marketing director. But I'm not bitter.

ahh Thrasher! and the heyday of [Powell Peralta](http://web.archive.org/web/20121029160221/http:/powell-peralta.axg.net/) (check the Majong type). They are still selling the Old Skool decks!   
Thanks for jogging that memory Jared ;)   
   
bren
